name: I made another game with chatGPT
name_original: I made another game with chatGPT
description:
I made another game with chatGPT.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar: enter car (it is blue)
  • R: restart level (probably the most important key in this game)

Complete all 4 quests to win!

If the browser version lags, please try the windows version.
I've also included the entire conversation which you can download
